Welcome to the PGC Video Textbook!

Here, we've pulled videos from our PGC experts to give a comprehensive overview of Psychiatric Genetics: From its history, current state of research, and resources for conducting analyses in Psychiatric genetics.

Each video is embedded into the textbook webpage, and a link to the video transcript has been provided below the video.
